workflows.name: Image Digitization
workflows.description: The process of taking an image that exists in the real world and turning it into a digital image file.

workflows.name: 2D Audio Corpus Explorer
workflows.description: We can slice a piece of audio into smaller parts, then describe it using a feature. Finally we can use dimensionality reduction to project these slices into a 2 or 3 dimensional space.

workflows.name: Video Embedding Projection
workflows.description: We can take a video, and get an embedding vector foer each frame which can be projected into a 2 or 3 dimensional space using dimensionality reduction.
